name: Meeting
message: You are about to meet with your One.

name: Spiritual Conversation
message: You want to have a meaningful spiritual conversation with your One.

name: Prayer Need
message: Your One has a specific prayer need.

name: Share about Faith
message: You want to share an aspect of your faith with your One.

name: Invite to Church
message: You want to invite your One to church.

name: Offer Help
message: You want to offer help or assistance to your One.

name: Build Rapport
message: You want to build rapport with your One.

name: Give Testimony
message: You want to share your personal testimony with your One.

name: Follow Up
message: You want to follow up on a previous conversation with your One.
